name: capicxx-someip-tools
body:
### Welcome to CommonAPI C++ for SOME/IP!
CommonAPI C++ is a C++ framework for interprocess and network communication which defines a high-level C++ API that can be used for different IPC mechanisms such as SOME/IP.  Please visit [http://genivi.github.io/capicxx-core-tools/](http://genivi.github.io/capicxx-core-tools/) if you are new to CommonAPI C++.

The CommonAPI C++ SOME/IP binding is based on the standard vsomeip implementation ([https://github.com/GENIVI/vsomeip/](https://github.com/GENIVI/vsomeip/)).

### Basic Features
* High-performance serialization of SOME/IP messages.

### Links
* Code generator (git): [https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-someip-tools/](https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-someip-tools/)
* Runtime Code (git): [https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-someip-runtime](https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-someip-runtime/)
* Code generator source code as zip/tar and executable, pdf-doc: [https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-someip-tools/releases](https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-someip-tools/releases)
* Eclipse update-site: [http://genivi.github.io/capicxx-someip-tools/updatesite/](http://genivi.github.io/capicxx-someip-tools/updatesite)
* Wiki: [https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-someip-tools/wiki/](https://github.com/GENIVI/capicxx-someip-tools/wiki/)

### Support
Please mail to the GENIVI ipc mailing list, see [http://lists.genivi.org/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/genivi-ipc/](http://lists.genivi.org/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/genivi-ipc/)
